recipes.label: Sneak In
recipes.startdescription: Sometimes, entry can be more comfortable if one goes unnoticed. This is one of those times. I can apply either the skills of Knock or the wiles of Moth.
recipes.description: Sometimes, entry can be more comfortable if one goes unnoticed. This is one of those times. I can apply either the skills of Knock or the wiles of Moth.

slots.description: Which implements are available for my approach.

recipes.label: Impossible Paths
recipes.startdescription: Geometry bends around us. We move through the spaces between spaces. we will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Improbable Paths
recipes.startdescription: We find the room that others neglect. We move through odd corners and narrow cracks. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Unexpected Paths
recipes.startdescription: We take the road less traveled by. Hopefully this will leave us undetected. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: Just the Wind
recipes.startdescription: "Who is there?" "Relax, there is nothing but the night out there..." We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Hidden Movements
recipes.startdescription: With the ants tenecacity and the moths subtlety, we will enter unseen where we are not wanted. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Skulking Movements
recipes.startdescription: Wolven steps and feline grace. We stalk quietly. We may yet succeed.
